DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter study to compare multiple doses of intravitreal microplasmin in patients undergoing surgical vitrectomy.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Microplasmin to Induce a Posterior Vitreous Detachment (MIVI III)
DOC.criteria: Patients in whom vitrectomy is indicated Posterior Vitreous Detachment (PVD) present at baseline Vitreous hemorrhage Certain vitreoretinal conditions including proliferative disease, rhegmatogenous retinal detachment, and proliferative vitreoretinopathy (PVR) Have had a vitrectomy in the study eye at any time
